attributes.action: conduct a cost - benefit analysis on the effectiveness of online petitions - feedback to the public on the project - your ministers publicly television broadcast for people's public sector improvement ideas, yet your IT team reject formal written online pettions - are they too busy setting up petitions by "the loon" ?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
